description: I have enough food for 5 people that can last one week. Contains non perishables, granola bars and fruits.
I can host 3 people in my house for two weeks until you find a new place to live. I am located in Los Angelos

name: Local Government
description: Providing food packs and clean water to affected areas. We have a large inventory of food supplies, bottled water, and hygiene kits, which we are distributing to shelters and community centers across the region. Our teams are ready to deploy at a moment's notice.

name: HealthCare Group
description: Offering comprehensive medical assistance including first aid kits, mobile clinics, and on-site medical professionals. Our services are designed to provide immediate and long-term support for those injured or in need of medical care.

name: Greg Theodon
description: Can provide temporary shelter for a small family. The shelter is a recently renovated structure equipped with basic amenities and can accommodate families in distress.

name: Food for Everyone
description: Delivering essential food and water supplies including perishable and non-perishable foods. We work with local partners to ensure that aid reaches the most vulnerable communities promptly.

name: Jim Green
description: I am living in the greater San Francisco area and I have 2 bedrooms that I can share with two people over the following weeks while you resettle. It is a 3 bedroom house with 1 shared bathroom and you will have to pay for food. No other payments are necessary.
